instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Critical software update Error
threads.message: [B]It throws critical update error while reinstalling. I tried disassembling the internal screen, disconnecting all the sockets, I tried, the result did not change[/B]

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Critical software update Error
threads.message:
Did you try known good touchbar?
Can you boot into macOS with touchbar disconnected?
Any power and signals checked on touchbar connectors?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Critical software update Error
threads.message: I tried removing the screen, battery and all sockets, the result did not change

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Critical software update Error
threads.message: Did you try booting in safe mode?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Critical software update Error
<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Critical software update Error
threads.message:
Any history available?

Possibly knocked off components...
